exceptions.exn: The LHS of Derive_scal (Derive (fun x : R => _ * _ x) _) does not match any subterm of the goal
In environment H : forall (f : R -> R) (k x : R), Derive (fun x0 : R => k * f x0) x = k * Derive f x f : R -> R k, x : R Unable to unify "Derive f x * k" with "Derive (fun x : R => f x * k) x".
